name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Kiara and Nene discuss their collaboration unit 'Orange Days', practice their special greeting pose, and talk about the challenges of learning the dance choreography for 'Kanashiki Heaven'.
Kiara transitions to a KFP-themed studio to announce the 'Hot Phoenix Thermo Bottle & Bottle Case Set' merchandise.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！オレンジだよね？
subtitles.english: Thanks! It's orange, right?

subtitles.original: そうね、それをずっとやる。
subtitles.english: That's right, we'll keep doing that.

subtitles.original: やり続ける。オケ、オケ。わかった。
subtitles.english: Keep doing it. Okay, okay. Got it.

subtitles.original: ここ、じゃ大事だね、これ。オケ。
subtitles.english: This part is important then. Okay.

subtitles.original: まぁオレンジデイズということで、どうする？
subtitles.english: Well, since we're Orange Days, what should we do?

subtitles.original: うーん、なんかテーマみたいな。オレンジのテーマ。
subtitles.english: Umm, like a theme. An orange theme.

subtitles.original: オレンジでしょ？オレンジで！オレンジ、オレンジ！
subtitles.english: Orange, right? With orange! Orange, orange!

subtitles.original: うーん、なんかこうグローバルな感じがいいな。はい、はい。
subtitles.english: Umm, I'd like a global feel. Yes, yes.

subtitles.original: Global, international. Okay.
subtitles.english: Global, international. Okay.

subtitles.original: So, how about we make the whole world orange?
subtitles.english: So, how about we make the whole world orange?

subtitles.original: おぉ、いいね！世界を...
subtitles.english: Oh, nice! The world...

subtitles.original: オレンジ色に染め上げるとか、染めていくとかどう？
subtitles.english: ...how about "dye it all in orange" or "keep dyeing it"?

subtitles.original: おんじゃ、染めちゃうにしよう。染めちゃうで。オケ、オケ。
subtitles.english: Then, let's go with "sometchau". "Sometchau" it is. Okay, okay.

subtitles.original: おんじゃ動きも。動き。We need some movement.
subtitles.english: Then, the movement too. Movement. We need some movement.

subtitles.original: え、え、世界観出して。世界... 世界を...
subtitles.english: Um, um, give it a world-view. World... The world...

subtitles.original: オレンジ色に...
subtitles.english: ...in orange color...

subtitles.original: 染めちゃう！で！
subtitles.english: ...sometchau! And!

subtitles.original: オレンジデイズ！いいね！オレンジデイズ！
subtitles.english: Orange Days! Nice! Orange Days!

subtitles.original: あ、オケ。これでいく？決まった。もう一回やってみよう。ちゃんと。もう一回。正式に。はい。
subtitles.english: Ah, okay. Shall we go with this? It's decided. Let's try it again. Properly. One more time. Officially. Yes.

subtitles.original: 世界を...
subtitles.english: The world...

subtitles.original: オレンジ色に...
subtitles.english: ...in orange color...

subtitles.original: 染めちゃう！
subtitles.english: ...sometchau!

subtitles.original: オレンジデイズ！わっちまた染めちゃうと言ったよ。まぁいいよ、いいよ。
subtitles.english: Orange Days! I said "sometchau" again. Well, it's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: オケ。これずっとやるのか、今後。
subtitles.english: Okay. Are we going to keep doing this from now on?

subtitles.original: そうやる。忘れちゃいけない。Don't forget, this is our official greeting now.
subtitles.english: We will. Mustn't forget. Don't forget, this is our official greeting now.

subtitles.original: えー、じゃあもう一個。えー、let's talk about the song and our practice and all that.
subtitles.english: Eh, then one more thing. Umm, let's talk about the song and our practice and all that.

subtitles.original: この曲についてと練習について語ろう。まずね、Kanashiki Heaven is another Hello Project song.
subtitles.english: Let's talk about this song and the practice. First of all, "Kanashiki Heaven" is another Hello Project song.

subtitles.original: I love Hello Project. And this is from °C-ute, the idol group °C-uteね。
subtitles.english: I love Hello Project. And this is from °C-ute, the idol group °C-ute.

subtitles.original: あ、°C-uteね。好きだもんね。
subtitles.english: Ah, °C-ute. You like them, don't you?

subtitles.original: Yeah. And it's a very dramatic, sad song with a strong dance move, strong choreographyね。
subtitles.english: Yeah. And it's a very dramatic, sad song with a strong dance move, strong choreography.

subtitles.original: あの激しい振り付けだったね。そうなの。ヤバかったよ、もう。ただ、うちらは...
subtitles.english: It was a really intense choreography, wasn't it? That's right. It was crazy. However, we...

subtitles.original: 二時間でできた。覚えました。Two hours. We had two hours of dance lessons together.
subtitles.english: Finished in two hours. We learned it. Two hours. We had two hours of dance lessons together.

subtitles.original: Yeah, the dance teacher was like, "Oh, you guys are learning it so quickly," she was happy.
subtitles.english: Yeah, the dance teacher was like, "Oh, you guys are learning it so quickly," she was happy.

subtitles.original: ダンスの先生がね、早く覚えてと。ね、褒めてくれたんだ。すごい。
subtitles.english: The dance teacher said we learned it quickly and... Right, she praised us. Amazing.

subtitles.original: すごい早いって言われたよね。ね。うちもねっちとのダンス練習は楽だろうなと思って楽しみにした。
subtitles.english: She said we were really fast, didn't she? I thought dance practice with Necchi would be easy and was looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: え、本当？ね、うちもすごい楽しみにした。でもちょっと朝だったから...
subtitles.english: Eh, really? Yeah, I was looking forward to it too. But it was a bit early in the morning, so...

subtitles.original: 朝じゃないから。Yeah, 昼過ぎてたよ。She's saying it was morning time so she was so tired...
subtitles.english: It wasn't morning. Yeah, it was past noon. She's saying it was morning time so she was so tired...

subtitles.original: ...but it was way past morning, it was already noon time. ねねにとっては昼は朝。
subtitles.english: ...but it was way past morning, it was already noon time. For Nene, noon is morning.

subtitles.original: なるほど。まぁうちもたまにそう。はい。え、苦労した振り付けとかある？
subtitles.english: I see. Well, I'm like that sometimes too. Yes. Um, was there any choreography you struggled with?

subtitles.original: この二番のこれね、この動きね。パンパンパン。
subtitles.english: This part in the second verse, this movement. Bam-bam-bam.

subtitles.original: それ難しいよね。タンタタン。早いから。で、ここが難しかった。タンタンタンタン。
subtitles.english: That's difficult, isn't it? Tan-ta-tan. Because it's fast. And this part was difficult. Tan-tan-tan-tan.

subtitles.original: 早いから。ばぁ。できてるかな？あ、違う。早いからな。そう、ゆっくりやるとすごい綺麗にできるんだけど。
subtitles.english: Because it's fast. Bam. I wonder if I'm doing it right? Ah, no. It's fast, you see. Yeah, if you do it slowly you can do it really beautifully.

subtitles.original: 大変だったけど、we did our best, it was fun, and I hope we can do more. 難しかったけど、もっとやりたい！
subtitles.english: It was hard, but we did our best, it was fun, and I hope we can do more. It was difficult, but I want to do more!

subtitles.original: やりたいやりたい！お願いしますお願いします！公式さんもお願いしますお願いします！オレンジをよろしく！
subtitles.english: I want to, I want to! Please, please! Official staff, please, please! Please take care of Orange Days!

subtitles.original: ということで、I'm gonna send off Nene-chi, so we're gonna change location. ねねちをとりあえず送り出す。
subtitles.english: So, I'm gonna send off Nene-chi, so we're gonna change location. For now, I'll send Nene-chi off.

subtitles.original: オケ。いってくるね！
subtitles.english: Okay. I'm off!

subtitles.original: バーン！Welcome back to KFP, guys!
subtitles.english: Baan! Welcome back to KFP, guys!

subtitles.original: I'm sorry, it's not over yet. I have something really important for you guys.
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, it's not over yet. I have something really important for you guys.

subtitles.original: And that is... what could it be? What could it be? That's right, merchandise!
subtitles.english: And that is... what could it be? What could it be? That's right, merchandise!

subtitles.original: Okay. Let me introduce to you, I mean, you know there's burgers and all that...
subtitles.english: Okay. Let me introduce to you, I mean, you know there's burgers and all that...

subtitles.original: ...but this time, very special, time-limited offer for you guys. Tada!
subtitles.english: ...but this time, very special, time-limited offer for you guys. Tada!

subtitles.original: It is the beautiful Hot Phoenix Thermo Bottle & Bottle Case Set.
subtitles.english: It is the beautiful Hot Phoenix Thermo Bottle & Bottle Case Set.

subtitles.original: Hot Phoenix Thermo Bottle & Bottle Case Set
subtitles.english: Hot Phoenix Thermo Bottle & Bottle Case Set

subtitles.original: That's right, it comes with like, kind of like a bag for the thermos bottle.
subtitles.english: That's right, it comes with like, kind of like a bag for the thermos bottle.

subtitles.original: I already saw it in reality and it looks so good! Yay!
subtitles.english: I already saw it in reality and it looks so good! Yay!

subtitles.original: And of course, it's thermos, which means your hot drinks will stay hot and your cold drinks will stay cold!
subtitles.english: And of course, it's thermos, which means your hot drinks will stay hot and your cold drinks will stay cold!

subtitles.original: Perfect! Genius! Oh my god.
subtitles.english: Perfect! Genius! Oh my god.
